textboxes.description: As you stroll through a bustling Italian piazza, you suddenly spot a familiar face in the crowd. It’s Francesco Totti, the legendary football player, signing autographs and chatting with fans. A group of excited onlookers surrounds him.

choices.text: Approach and ask for an autograph
Challenge him to a friendly penalty kick

textboxes.description: You manage to slip through the crowd and catch Totti’s attention. He grins, signs a card for you, and asks if you’d like a quick photo.

choices.text: Ask him for tips on handling the press

textboxes.description: You watch from a distance, enjoying the sight of Totti interacting with his fans. He seems down-to-earth and genuine, a true hero to those around him.

choices.text: Walk up and join the fans
Move on and explore the rest of the piazza

textboxes.description: You confidently challenge Totti to a penalty kick competition. He laughs, clearly amused, and agrees to give it a shot. A small crowd gathers to watch.
Totti puts his arm around you as you both smile for a quick snapshot. As you step away, he gives you a friendly nod.

choices.text: Thank him and wish him well

textboxes.description: Totti chuckles and shares a few insights on handling public attention. His words are practical, and he seems genuinely interested in giving helpful advice.

choices.text: Thank him and take his advice to heart

textboxes.description: You kick the ball with all your might. The crowd cheers as the ball sails toward the goal. It’s close, but you nearly miss!

choices.text: Laugh it off and let Totti try

textboxes.description: Totti takes his shot, sending the ball soaring with incredible skill. The crowd erupts in cheers. He grins at you, clearly enjoying the friendly competition.
You challenge Totti to another round. With a playful smile, he agrees, ready to give it another go. This time, you focus and kick with precision.
Totti takes a moment to show you a few football tips, his experience evident in every word. You feel inspired by his dedication to the sport.

choices.text: Thank him and head on your way

textboxes.description: As you leave, you feel a strange sense of accomplishment and warmth. Meeting a legend like Totti was a once-in-a-lifetime experience, and you can’t help but smile as you walk away, already inspired by the encounter.
